task.summary: changed return from tuple to dict
updates and fixes, and removed unused saving
updates for not using test set for every epoch
flake8 fixes and updated type hint from old code
set continuous testing to false, removed unused saving keys, and minor changes to values in config files
improved error when trouble computing eigenvalues
implementations for continuing experiments if things go wrong
added script for continuing experiments if things go wrong
removed unused line and made config files re-only
added todos, added type hinting, and removed default arguments
added test verifying that data extraction from CombinedDatasets is safe
clean up and improvements to CombinedDatasets class
made interpolation a part of 'preprocessing' to avoid doing it at runtime. Also, logging potential failures when doing preprocessing and documenting autorejected epochs
changed from 'fold' to 'split' and updates for avoid reloading data when some of it was loaded for pretext task in PretrainHPO

added functionality for filtering out subjects based on the input data, downstream target, and pseudo target availability. Also, expanded the target method decorator such that, if '.availability' decorator is used, the target method can return the subjects which has that target availble
expanded subject split class to exclude multiple datasets instead of just one
added functionality for (1) defining SubjectSplit and (2) loading data before running SingleExperiment. Also , changed folder names from fold to split
changed type to argument and added remove method
major improvements to making subject splitting more robust (+ improved documentation)

MESSAGE.value: made interpolation a part of 'preprocessing' to avoid doing it at runtime. Also, logging potential failures when doing preprocessing and documenting autorejected epochs
changed from 'fold' to 'split' and updates for avoid reloading data when some of it was loaded for pretext task in PretrainHPO

added functionality for filtering out subjects based on the input data, downstream target, and pseudo target availability. Also, expanded the target method decorator such that, if '.availability' decorator is used, the target method can return the subjects which has that target availble
expanded subject split class to exclude multiple datasets instead of just one
added functionality for (1) defining SubjectSplit and (2) loading data before running SingleExperiment. Also , changed folder names from fold to split
changed type to argument and added remove method
major improvements to making subject splitting more robust (+ improved documentation)

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: major improvements to making subject splitting more robust (+ improved documentation)
